defs: = ಗೌಡುಂಬಳಿ.
a grant of land given to the chief of a village for his livelihood.
= ಗೌಡುಂಬಳಿ.
of less importance; not essential; secondary, subordinate.
(rhet.) not in its original, usual, literal or exact sense; representing one concept in terms of another that may be thought of as analogous with it; metaphorical; figurative.
that which is of no or less importance; a secondary thing of subject; that which does not require or deserve serious consideration.
lack of something necessary for completeness; deficiency; shortcoming; a defect.
the quality of being less or not important or being subordinate or minor.
name of a celebrated sage, the propounder of the Nyāya philosophy.
Siddhartha Gautama, religious philosopher and teacher who lived in India c. 563c. 483 B.C. and was the founder of Buddhism; Buddha.
the river Gōdāvari in central India, flowing from the Western Ghats into the Bay of Bengal (1,440 km).
an association of traders or other commerce vocations.
a religious rite performed on a boy, at the age of sixteen, by shaving the front portion of his head in elliptical shape.
a man engaged in or whose occupation is, agriculture.

a harmless, moderate-sized, tropical lizard, Iguana tuberculata of Iguanidae family, having a row of spines from neck to tail, which is known for its grip and used in scaling forts, and which feeds on insects or vegetation; the common iguana.
the floor of the grain of the grass Triticum dicoccum ( = T. aestivum, = T. Vulgare) of Poaceae family, used most widely in making cereals, pastries, cakes etc.; wheat-flour.
= ಗೌಧಾರ.
= ಗೌಧಾರ.
2) a young of this animal.

a long, loose outer garment; esp. a) a loose robe for wear when one is not fully clothed; b) a nightgown, nightshirt, etc.; c) a loose, cotton smock worn by a surgeon; d) a long, flowing robe worn as a symbol of office or status by certain officials, clergymen, scholars, etc.; a gown.
something known only to a certain person or persons and purposely or meant to be a thing kept or meant to be kept secret.
of white, light yellow colour; of fair complexion.
the white colour.
the reddish or light red colour.
the golden yellow colour.
the moon.
the filament of a lotus.
the seed of the plant Brassica alba; white mustard.
a wild buffalo; gaur.
of, from, relating to one's teacher.

honorary - a) given as an honour only, without the usual requirements or privileges; b) designating an office or position held as an honour only, without service or pay; c) holding such a position or office; d) recognising academic distinction or accomplishment.
weight; heaviness.
importance; high value or estimation; esteem.
respect; regard; consideration.
respectability; venerableness.
a respectable man.
egoism; self-conceit.
a book brought in honour of a person.
(Jain.) pride that a person gets from one's voice (or speech), wealth and soundness of the body.
(pros.) a literary fault of placing the long syllable where the short one should have been.
a payment as to a professional person for services on which no fee is set or legally obtainable; honorarium.

(loosely) royalty - a) a share of the proceeds or product paid to the owner of a right, as a patent, for permission to use it or operate under it; b) such a share paid to one from whom lands rich in oil or minerals are leased; c) a share of proceeds, usu. a specified percentage, paid for the work of an author, composer, etc. by the publisher.
a state honour, usu. by military or police personnel, given to a dignitary.
the respectful form of a word addressed to a person.
a payment, esp. a voluntary one for professional services rendered without the normal fee; honorarium.
a man who is worthy of being respected; a respectable man.
a woman whois worthy of being respected; a respectable woman.
worthy of respect or esteem; estimable; respectable.
= ಗೌರವಸ್ಥ.
= ಗೌರವಸ್ಥೆ.
worthy of respect or esteem; estimable; respectable.
a man worthy of respect; a respectable man.
a woman worthy of respect; a respectable woman.

to respect - a) to feel or show honour or esteem for; to hold in high regard; b) to consider or treat with deference or dutiful regard; c) to show consideration for; to avoid intruding upon or interfering with.
a man of white or fair complexion.
a woman of white or fair complexion.
a girl in the stage prior to menstruation.
Pārvati, wife of Śiva.
a woman of white or fair complexion.
a bright yellow pigment prepared from the urine or bile of a cow or vomited by a cow in the form of scybala.
the plant Rubia cordifolia ( = R. munjista) of Rubiaceae family; Indian madder.
the plant Ocimum sanctum of Lamiaceae family; basil.
a kind of jasmine plant.
a kind of maize.
the tree Bridelia retusa of Euphorbiaceae family.
a kind of plant .
the third day in Bhādrapada, the 6th month in Hindu Calendar.
a festival observed on that day.
the creeper Ichnocarpus frutescens of Apocynceae family; black creeper.
the plant Ipomoea nil ( = I. hederaceae) of Convolvulaceae family.
the colour of pure ice; white colour.
the tall tree Polylthia fragrans of Annonaceae family.
a kind of plant.
its flower.
a festival observed on the third day in Bhādrapada, the 6th month in Hindu lunar calendar.
the full moon-day in Kārthika the eighth month of Hindu lunar calendar.
the festival observed on that day.
= ಗೌರಿಹುಣ್ಣಿಮೆ.
the plant Impatiens balsamina of Balsaminaceae family.
its flower.
= ಗೌರಿತದಿಗೆ.
Śiva, the consort of Gauri.
a silvery-white, brittle, very poisonous chemical element, compounds of which are used in making insecticides, glass, medicines, semiconductors, etc. (symbol, As); arsenic.
= ಗೌರೀಧವ.
(mus.) twenty-third of the seventy-two main rāgas (modes).
a variety in vīṇe, the Indian lute.
= ಗೌರೀಧವ.
Mount peak of the Himalayas, on the border of Nepal & Tibet, highest known mountain in the world (29,028 ft., 8,848 m).
(fig.) a person who is incomparable or unparalleled in his or her field of activity; ಗೌರೀಶಂಕರವನ್ನು ಮುಟ್ಟು gaurīsankaravannu muṭṭu to achieve great heights (in one's field of activity).
(med.) a medicinal substance made from mercury, sulphur etc.
a shrill, high-pitched, harsh sound; screech.
a kind high-pitched war-trumpet.
= ಗೌವಲೆ.
odour - a) that characteristic of a substance which makes it perceptible to the sense of smell; b) a smell, whether pleasant or unpleasant; fragrance, stench, etc.
= ಗೌವಲೆ.
(dial.) bits of wheaten flour rolled between the fingers into the size and shape of grains of wheat.
pāyasa, a kind of liquid sweet dish made of this.
the chief of a village.
a caste the main occupation of the members of which is agriculture and farming.
a member of that caste.
the wife of the chief of a village.
a female servant.
the office, status, duty etc. of the chief of a village.
= ಗೌಸಣಿಗೆ.
anything that covers as a cover, wrapper, case, veil, etc.
a case for the blade of a knife, sword, etc.; a sheath.
name of a region including the present Bengal and northern part of Orissa in Eastern India.
that which is connected to or made from sugarcane.
(mus.) a musical mode, in Karnāṭaka system, derived from the main mode Māyām āḷava gauḷa.
a kind of necklace having round beads.
(said of sound, voice) unpleasantly sharp; grating to the ear.
a kind of plant.
= ಗೌಳಿಪಂತು.
rough voice.
a kind of necklace having round beads.
a kind of ornament for the forearms.
the house lizard.
a musical mode.
a man who tends grazing cattle and sells milk and curds; a cowherd.
a caste, the members of which are mainly cowherds and live on selling milk, curds, butter, etc.
the wife of the chief of a village.
a female servant.
a female of cowherd caste.
a kind of tree.
the characteristic sound of the house lizard, supposed to foretell symbolically about the coming events.
(mus.) a musical mode, in Karnāṭaka system, derived from the main mode Māyām āḷava gauḷa.
a foretelling about the coming events the house lizards supposed to indicate by their characteristic sound.
= ಗೌರುಗಹಳೆ.
to emit harsh, shrill sound; to screech.
= ಗೌಱಗಿ.
the quality of being stiff and brittle, easily broken, snapped or crumbled; crispness.
ಗೌಱುಬದನೆಯ ಕಾಯಿ gauru badaneya kāyi a dish made of brinjal by burning it and making it crisp.
= ಗೌರುಗಹಳೆ.
= ಗೌರುಗಹಳೆ.
= ಗೌರುಗಹಳೆ.
a small, crisp, spicy cake, fried in oil.
a group of people associated together in some way, esp. a) a group of workers directed by a foreman; b) an organised group of criminals; c) a squad of convicts at work; a gang.
the plant Erythroxylon monogynum of Erythroxylaceae family, grows s a small tree or bush, the bark and leaves of which are used for preparing certain medicinal substances; bastard sandal.
the state of being assured; sureness; certainty; guarantee.
a unit of liquid measure equal to 4 quarts (3.7854 American litres or 4.546 British or Canadian litres); a gallon.
a raised area, having a stepped or sloping floor, in a theatre, stadium or other public building to accommodate spectators; gallery.
a shallow, oblong tray for holding composed type before it is put into a form; a galley.
the fluid form of a substance in which it can expand indefinitely and completely fill its container; form that is neither liquid nor solid; a gas.
any mixture of flammable gases used for lighting, heating or cooking; the cooking gas.
various gaseous substances formed by living or decaying matter, esp. if formed in the stomach, bowels, etc.
volatile, highly flammable, colourless liquid mixture of hydrocarbons produced by the fractional distillation of petroleum and used chiefly as a fuel in internal-combustion engines; gasoline.
a lamp that uses the kerosene vaporised by pressure; a gas-lamp.
(fig.) a false statement made with or without intent to deceive.
a stove that uses gas as fuel; a gas-stove.
(rightly) = ಗ್ರಂಥ.
the act of tying, binding together.
a literary, philosophical, scientific work, anthology, etc. so prepared, distinguished by length and form from a magazine, tract, etc.; a treatise, a book.
a formal, systematic written article or book on some subject, esp. a discussion of facts, evidence or principles and the conclusions based on these; a treatise.
the holy scriptures of any religion.
any of the four Vēdās, sacred books of Hindus.
a verse in the meter anuṣṭuppu, in which each foot has eight letters.
a set of thirty-two syllables.
the Tamiḷ alphabet system adapted as to be able to write Samskřta words as per their original pronunciations.
knowledge of excellent or worthy subject or subjects.
(math.) the number which is divided or to be divided by another.
indebtedness of an author for other authors whose works had been referred, and opinions, quotations etc. are reproduced.
a writer of a book, treatise, scripture, etc.; an author.
= ಗ್ರಂಥಕರ್ತ.
= ಗ್ರಂಥಕರ್ತ.
any of various families of primitive, wingless thysanuran insects with silvery scales, long feelers, and a bristly tail, which thrive in dampness and darkness and are injurious to books.
(fig.) a person whose knowledge is limited to what he or she has read and not backed by practical experience.
the act of tying, binding together.
the act, process or fact of writing a book.
the plant Grangea maderaspatana ( = Artemisia maderaspatana) of Asteraceae family.
the fact of a part of an old manuscript that is lost (as eaten by insects, the palmyra leaves being broken, etc.).
a man in charge of a library (usu. one trained in library science); a librarian.
= ಗ್ರಂಥಾಲಯ.
= ಗ್ರಂಥಪಾಲ.
the act of authoring a book.
= ಗ್ರಂಥಕರ್ತ.
a man who copies for the author, a book; a copier.

the act, process of making a manuscript of another author ready for publication, often consulting different manuscripts of the same work, and considering other aspects such as authoṛs time, other works, subject dealt with, etc., language, style, etc.

a list , in a library, of available books, its authors, subjects, publishers, date of publication, title of the books, etc. are arranged alphabetically, subject-wise, etc., and also where they may be found.
a list of books referred by an author in producing his or work, usu. appended at the end of the book; bibliography.
the exclusive right to the publication, production or sale of the rights to a literary, dramatic work, granted by law for a specified period of time to the author or publisher, etc.; copyright.
a room or building where a collection of books, periodicals, musical scores, films, phonograph records, etc., is systematically arranged for reading or reference; a library.
something that is binding, tying, joining together, etc.; a tie; a knot; a bond.
the hard joint of the stem of a plant (as of jowar, sugarcane, bamboo, etc.).
a short, thickened, fleshy part of an underground stem, as a potato; a tuber.
(anat.) a place or part where two bones or corresponding structures are joined, usu. so that they can move; a joint.
a tumour - a) a swelling on some part of the body; b) a mass of new tissue growth independent of its surrounding structures, having no physiological function either benign or malignant; a neoplasm.
any organ or specialised group of cells that produces secretions, as insulin or bile or excretions, as urine: a gland.
a particular type of stomach ache.
= ಗ್ರಂಥಪರ್ಣಿ.
the grass Cyperus bulbosus of Cyperaceae family.
the root of the plant Piper chaba ( = P. officinarum) used for medicinal purpose.
a man who explains succinctly a passage of or whole of a book; a commentator.
a kind of plant ( = Tabernaemontana divaricata of Apocynaceae family, the roots of which are used for medicinal purpose ?).
a drug or other substance (chiefly, herbal extraction) used in treating disease, healing or relieving pain.
tied, bound together; joined.
systematically written; properly dealt with the subject, evidence or principles.
= ಗ್ರಂಥಪರ್ಣಿ.
= ಗ್ರಂಥಪರ್ಣಿ.
having or full of knots; knotty.
the plant Flacourtia indica ( = F. sapida, = F. sepiaria) of Flacourtiaceae family.
its plum.
the plant Capparis decidua ( = C. aphylla) of Capparaceae family; common caper.
inflammation of a joint or joints, esp. as in rheumatoid arthritis; arthritis.
a kind of medicinal substance used in curing arthritis.
a man who sells perfumes.
a man who sells medicinal herbs, and other medicinal drugs.
an eye-doctor.
perfumes, aromatic substances collectively.
the business or profession of selling perfumes, etc.
medicinal herbs or drugs collectively.
a shop for selling perfumes or medicinal herbs, medicinal drugs, etc.
the act of tying, binding or stringing together.
the act of causing (a liquid) to become coagulated; coagulation.
a writing, composing (of a literary work).
tied, bound together; joined, in a particular order or manner.
= ಗ್ರಥಿಸು.
to bring together (different ideas as in writing a book, etc.); to write a book; to author.
to come together; to assemble together.
the act of swallowing something (as food).
a partial eclipse of the sun or moon (mythologically eclipse is caused by a demon-snake swallowing the sun or moon).
to pass (food, drink, etc.) from the mouth through the gullet or oesophagus into the stomach, usu. by a series of muscular actions in the throat; to swallow.
seized with the mouth.
swallowed; devoured; eaten.
the act of pronouncing a word omitting a letter or syllable.
he who has been eaten by (another).
a man possessed (by an evil spirit,); he who is overwhelmed (by fear).
the setting of the sun or moon while being eclipsed.
seizure - a) the act of one who seizes or an instance of this; b) the state or an instance of being seized.
the act of receiving (something from another).
(myth.) Rāhu or Kētu, either of the two demons who are supposed to eclipse the sun or moon by swallowing them.

a large, opaque, non-luminous mass, usu. with its own moons, that revolves about a star; esp. any of the sun's nine major planets - Mercury, Venus, Earth, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune, and Pluto; a planet.
(astrol.) any of the nine celestial bodies, as the Sun, Moon, Mars, Mercury, Jupiter, Venus, Saturn, Rāhu and Kētu, thought of as influencing human lives.
any of the evil spirits that are supposed to possess human.
the condition of being possessed by an evil spirit.
a Brahmaṇa.
the earth.
the living beings collectively.
the symbol for the number nine.
a dwelling place; a house.
(mus.) a note with which a rāga (musical mode) is begun or must be begun with.
any of the thousands of small planets ranging from 1,000 km (621 mi.) to less than one km (0.62 mi.) in diameter, revolving around a main planet; an asteroid.
(astrol.) the condition of two or more planets being in the same zodiac house or in a few particular zodiac houses; conjunction of planets.
the actual or imaginary movement of a planet or planets.
(astrol.) the positions or movements of different planets that influence human lives differently.
a mechanical apparatus which illustrates with balls of various sizes the relative motions and positions of the earth, moon, sun, etc.; an orrery.
a man who is possessed by an evil spirit.
a woman whois possessed by an evil spirit.
(astrol.) a cluster, conjunction of two or more planets.
= ಗ್ರಹಗತಿ.
the condition (esp. miserable one) supposed to be caused by the positions or movements of planets.
(gen.) the miserable condition of a person.

ಗ್ರಹಚಾರ ಬಿಡಿಸು grahacāra biḍisu (fig.) to scold severely; ಗ್ರಹಚಾರ ವಕ್ರಿಸು grahacāra vakrisu (a miserable plight) to befall; (something) to eclipse; to bring ill-fame to; ಗ್ರಹಚಾರ ಹಿಡಿ grahacāra hiḍi = ಗ್ರಹಚಾರ ವಕ್ರಿಸು.
seizure - a) the act of one who seizes or an instance of this; b) the state or an instance of being seized.
the act of receiving (something from another).
the partial or total obscuring of one celestial body by another, as of the sun when the moon comes between it and the earth or of the moon when the earth's shadow is cast upon it; an eclipse.
(myth.) the condition of or duration of time in which the sun or moon is swallowed by Rāhu or Kētu, the two demons.
the act of taking hold of mentally; understanding; comprehension.
a throwing into the shade; loss of brilliancy.
a dimming or extinction, as of flame, glory, wellbeing, etc.
(dance.) a posture in which the dancer stands biting his or her nails.
one's ability to take hold of mentally; grasping capacity.
any of various intestinal inflammations characterised by excessive frequency and looseness of bowel movements; dysentery.
a disease, affecting children, characterised by the bones becoming soft and distorted.
the sun, considered as the chief of planets.
the actual or imaginary path taken by a celestial body during its periodic revolution around another body; the orbit of a planet.
misery, distress supposed to be or have been caused by the positions or movements of planets.
(astrol.) the grace, favour etc. supposed to be endowed on a person by a planet or planets.
= ಗ್ರಹಪೀಡೆ.
frightened, unnerved by the distress, torture supposed to have been caused by an evil spirit.
a man who is frightened by the distress supposed to have been inflicted by an evil spirit.
a woman whois frightened by the distress supposed to have been inflicted by an evil spirit.
= ಗ್ರಹಮೈತ್ರಿ.
(astrol.) a favourable matching of planets in the zodiacs of a man and a woman proposed to get married to each other.
(astrol.) a conjunction of two or more planets that influence human beings.
diseases, distress etc. supposed to be or have been caused by the positions or movements of planets.
propitiation of the planets by offerings, to avoid, mitigate the distress believed to be or to have been, caused by them.
(mus.) a note with which a rāga (musical mode) is begun or must be begun with.
understanding, comprehension - a) the act of grasping with the mind; b) understanding or knowledge that results from this.
ಗ್ರಹಿಕೆಯಾಗು grahikeyāgu to be comprehended, understood.
seized; grasped; held.
he who comprehends, understands.
to hold, grasp, seize (as with the hand).
to receive; to accept (something from another).
to grasp mentally; to understand; to comprehend.
an instrument formerly used to find the altitude of a star, etc. (which was replaced by the sextant); an astrolabe.
the basic unit of mass in the metric system, officially equal to the weight of one cubic centimetre of distilled water at 4ºC:.
of or having to do with books or writing.
characterised by the more formal, balanced, and polished language of literature rather than the informal language of speech.
= ಗ್ರಹಣ.
a more or less concentrated group of houses and private and public buildings, larger than a village but smaller than a city; a town.
a number of things gathered or placed closely together, forming a recognisable unit; a group.
a complete musical scale having all the seven notes, i.e. any of the major scales; a gamut.
the chief of a village or town.
= ಗ್ರಾಮಕೂಟ.
an industry, esp. manufacturing activity, wholly carried on, in a small scale, in a town or village; village-industry.
a village servant.
the area in and around a town that comes under the jurisdiction of that town administration.
the chief of a village or town.
a man of (usu. social) prominence.
a person who cuts hair and shaves or trims beards of as an occupation; a barber.
the chief of a village or town.
the office, status, duty etc. of the chief of a village.
a carpenter working for the village.
a cluster of villagers or towns.
any general tax levied by the village or town authorities.
an erstwhile tax levied on a person or family that has migrated to another village.
a giving of a town as a gift.
a tax or taxes levied or collected by the town or village authority.
the presiding deity of a town or village.
the village or town council that acts as the local government.
the act of formally and religiously inaugurating a new town for inhabitation.
the expenditure incurred or to be incurred for a village or by the town council (as for welfare, development, sanitary, etc. purposes).
(masc.) the unskilled village labourer.
the chief of a village or town.
the limits, boundary of a town or village.
a set of rules or regulations to be observed by the people of a particular town or village, made by the elders or the council of that town or village.
= ಗ್ರಾಮಸಿಂಹ.
a complete musical scale having all the seven notes, i.e. any of the major scales; a gamut.
the castor plant (Ricinus communis of Euphorbiaceae family) (that commonly grows in most of the villages).
the affairs or management of a town or village.
a person living in a village or town.
propitiation of the village-god or goddess, planets etc. by offerings, to avoid, mitigate the distress believed to be or to have been, caused by them to the village.
ಗ್ರಾಮಶಾಂತಿಗಾಗಿ ತಳವಾರ ತಲೆಬೋಳಿಸಿಕೊಂಡ grāma śantigāgi taḷavāra tale bōḷisikoṇḍa (prov.) a proverb meaning that one sacrificed something for the welfare of others (often used sarc).
= ಗ್ರಾಮಸಿಂಹ.
the filth of a village or town.
(fig.) a dog, as the lion of the village.
(fig.) an imitative thing that is not worth as the imitated one.
a village hog (as opp. the wild one).
= ಗ್ರಾಮವಾಸಿ.
(dia.) a village officer (as the chief of the village, accountant, etc.).
= ಗ್ರಾಮವಾಸಿ.
the land, region inside and adjoining the boundary line of a village.
a rural region, as distinguished from a city; countryside.
a region in the outskirts of a town or village.
the income (as from tax etc.) of a village or town.
the chief of a village or town.
= ಗ್ರಾಮಾಧಿಪ.
a device for reproducing, using a stylus, sound that has been mechanically transcribed in a spiral groove on a circular disk; a gramophone; a phonograph.
a division of a country.
the chief of a town or village.
a village servant.
a man lacking refinement, elegance, polish or sophistication; a rustic.
of or characteristic of the country, country life or country people; rustic; rural.
a man living in countryside.
that which lacks refinement, elegance, polish, sophistication, etc.
a man living in countryside.
= ಗ್ರಾಮಾಧಿಪ.
an industry, esp. manufacturing activity, wholly carried on, in a small scale, in a town or village; village-industry.
in, of or suggesting the country (opp. to that of city); rural.
unsophisticated, simple, unrefined, rude; (said of language, behaviour etc.).
a man who lacks sophistication, refinement etc.; a stupid, uncouth, uncultured man.
sexual union; copulation.
(rhet.) a rude word or language not following the rules of grammar, usage of which in a literary work is considered as a fault.
a village watchman; a village servant.
the quality or fact of belonging, made in to countryside.
the quality of being rustic, uncouth.
(rhet.) usage of vulgar or rustic speech (in a literary work, considered as a fault).
sexual union; copulation.
any of the domesticated animals.
= ಗ್ರಾಮ್ಯಧರ್ಮ.
= ಗ್ರಾಮ್ಯೋಕ್ತಿ.
a woman wholacks sophistication, refinement etc.; a stupid, uncouth, uncultured woman.
(rhet.) a literary style in which words are simple, sounding sweet and smooth; mellifluous style.
vulgar, indecent or obscene speech.
a stone or rock.
a hillock or hill.
that which is hard or harsh as a rock.
courage; brave attitude.
cloud.
any piece of certain kinds of material, as iron, that has the property of attracting like material; a magnet.
a loose mixture of pebbles and rock fragments coarser than sand, often mixed with clay, etc.; gravel.
the act of swallowing something (as food).
that much quantity of food which can be held in the palm (for eating).
food (in gen.).
(collectively) food articles as grain, spices, corn, oil, etc.
the eclipsed portion of the sun or moon.
= ಗ್ರಾಸಗೊಳು.
to take into the stomach by drawing through the throat and oesophagus with a voluntary muscular action, as food or other substances; to swallow.
to get food.
a man who is interested or engaged in getting food and clothes and not having any zeal or interest for other things.
a person or animal that takes food.
a person who eats and drinks excessively or voraciously; a glutton.
to take (something as food) into the stomach through the throat; to swallow.
(fig.) to serve entirely; to envelop.
the act of one who seizes or an instance of this; seizure; holding.
the act of receiving (something from another).
any rapacious animal, chiefly living in water, as crocodile, shark, hippopotamus, etc.
(myth.) name of a hell.
holding; catching, seizing.
receiving; taking.
including within or enveloping.
a man who receives or can receive; a receiver.
he who seizes, as a police officer.
a man who comprehends, understands.

a thing that receives, as an apparatus or device that converts incoming electromagnetic waves or electrical signals into audible or visual signals, such as a radio or television receiving set or that part of a telephone which is held to the ear; a receiver.
a man who buys goods or services from a shop or business; a customer.
the ability to contain, absorb or receive and hold.
= ಗ್ರಾಹಕತ್ವ.
the medium sized, deciduous tree Feronia limonia ( = F. elephantum) of Rutaceae family; wood-apple tree.
holding; catching, seizing.
receiving; taking.
understanding or capable of understanding.
